name: Unblock
storyline:
At some point in our lives, we all face tough decisions during challenging times.
That’s exactly what happens to Devon, an aspiring game developer who, after a string of failed projects, is tricked by an evil magician and trapped in a whimsical world made entirely of clay.
Jump, run, fall and think your way through vibrant environments, all while uncovering the story of Devon’s journey and the magician’s sinister moves.
Will you help Devon escape the cubic realm and reclaim his ordinary life?
summary:
Unblock is a little pseudo-isometric platformer about resilience and the power of never giving up.

Jump your way through colorful, handcrafted worlds that are as cute as they are challenging, and help Devon as he escapes the cubic realm to reclaim his ordinary life.
